text.text: One of the additions for Archaeology portion of the mod is the Crystal Scarab Gem. A powerful relic of lost empires, the crystal scarab gem has the power of many, many tonnes of tnt.

They can be found in Fossil Poacher's homes, the black market. They can also be found in Bastion Reminent's tressure room. However, they will need to be reassembled as the years of being stolen and traded. They are found in six parts, four for their legs, one for the thorax, and one for the head
